message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
That's a bit too high for me. How about we start at $50?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $50. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
It's getting closer, but I'm still aiming for a lower price.  Would you consider $65?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. How about we meet at $85?
I appreciate you working with me. I'm willing to go up slightly to $70, but that's as high as I can go.
I'm not quite there yet, but I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $78?
